meanings.definition: A member of a royal family.
meanings.sent1: The royals lived in a grand palace.
meanings.sent2: The royals attended the royal ball.
meanings.sent3: The royals had a royal feast in the castle.
meanings.sent4: The royals' presence was as majestic as the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The young princess learned royal etiquette from the royals.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a royal family.
meanings.sent1: The royal crown adorned the royals' heads.
meanings.sent2: The royal robes were worn by the royals.
meanings.sent3: The royal banquet was fit for the royals.
meanings.sent4: The royal decree was followed by all the royals.
meanings.sent5: The royal carriage carried the royals through the kingdom.

meanings.definition: A baseball team based in Kansas City, Missouri.
meanings.sent1: The royals won the baseball game last night.
meanings.sent2: The fans cheered for the royals at the stadium.
meanings.sent3: The royals hit a home run in the ninth inning.
meanings.sent4: The royals' victory brought joy to the city.
meanings.sent5: The young boy dreamed of playing for the royals one day.

meanings.sent1: The printer ran out of royals paper.
meanings.sent2: The document was printed on royals-sized paper.
meanings.sent3: The artist used royals paper for the sketch.
meanings.sent4: The royals paper was perfect for the project.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked for royals paper for the assignment.
